content.body: I just noticed that, in the HTML spec, if you have a variable like `<var>x<sub>current</sub></var>` and you click on the 'x' part, it highlights, but if you click on the 'current' part, it doesn't. I guess that's because the target of the click event is the sub, not the var, and the sub doesn't care about clicks.
